en: Kim was two years senior to him.
zh: 金比他大两岁。

en: Kim means to be a diplomat in the future.
zh: 金将来打算当一名外交官。

en: Kim is older than I am by four years.
zh: 金比我大四岁。

en: Kim was still alive.
zh: 金还活着。

en: Kim smiled sweetly.
zh: 金甜甜地笑了。

en: Kim is living with Ken.
zh: 金和肯住在一起。

en: Kim and I are the same age.
zh: 金和我同岁。

en: Kim's smile was very sweet.
zh: 金的笑容非常甜美。

en: I've loved you from the moment I saw you.
zh: 我从见到你的那一刻起就爱上你了。

en: Is this getting you going too?
zh: 这也让你兴奋了吗？

en: Do you believe in ghosts?
zh: 你相信有鬼吗？

en: You only have to be here at six tomorrow morning.
zh: 你明天早上六点到这里就行了。

en: Can you really not swim?
zh: 你真的不会游泳吗？

en: You make me happy.
zh: 你让我快乐。

en: You are my sunshine.
zh: 你是我的阳光。

en: You can keep this dictionary if necessary.
zh: 如果需要，你可以留下这本字典。

en: You look tired.
zh: 你看上去很累。

en: You must remember the fact that you owe her a lot.
zh: 你必须记住你欠她很多。

en: You said she was kind and so she is.
zh: 你说她很善良，她确实如此。

en: You must be just to them.
zh: 你必须公正地对待他们。

en: You should go to see him.
zh: 你应该去看他。

en: You had better act upon his advice.
zh: 你最好按照他的建议去做。

en: I took it for granted that you knew the whole matter.
zh: 我理所当然地认为你知道整件事。

en: You should apologize for your rudeness.
zh: 你应该为你的粗鲁道歉。

en: Were you at home yesterday?
zh: 你昨天在家吗？

en: Have you ever been to Nara?
zh: 你去过奈良吗？

en: What a big house you have!
zh: 你家真大啊！

en: You will get well in a week or so.
zh: 你大概一星期左右就会痊愈。

en: You have to polish your English.
zh: 你得好好打磨你的英语。

en: Did you mistake the margarine for butter?
zh: 你是不是把人造黄油当成黄油了？

en: You may get a serious disease.
zh: 你可能会得重病。

en: You needn't have bought that book.
zh: 你本不必买那本书的。

en: You had to join that project.
zh: 你不得不参加那个项目。

en: You will have to join the project.
zh: 你将不得不参加那个项目。

en: You didn't join that club, did you?
zh: 你没参加那个俱乐部，是吧？

en: You ought not to go there alone.
zh: 你不应该独自去那里。

en: You need not do so.
zh: 你没必要这么做。

en: All you have to do is to hand this book to him.
zh: 你所要做的就是把这本书交给他。

en: You will be in charge of the babies in this room.
zh: 你将负责这个房间里的婴儿。

en: Your arms and legs have grown strong enough.
zh: 你的胳膊和腿已经长得足够强壮了。

en: Your parents ought to know it.
zh: 你的父母应该知道这件事。

en: Your knowledge surprises me.
zh: 你的知识让我惊讶。

en: Are you sure of your answer?
zh: 你确定你的答案吗？

en: Your explanation lacks concreteness.
zh: 你的解释缺乏具体性。

en: I'll mark where there are mistakes in your writing.
zh: 我会标出你写作中的错误。

en: I am ashamed of your despicable deed.
zh: 我为你的卑鄙行为感到羞耻。

en: It follows from what you say that he was not there.
zh: 从你所说的话可以推断出他不在那里。

en: Your opinion means nothing to me.
zh: 你的意见对我来说毫无意义。

en: I'm not going to agree to your proposal so readily.
zh: 我不会轻易同意你的提议。

en: Never did I say bad things about you.
zh: 我从来没有说过你的坏话。

en: Your cough is the consequence of smoking.
zh: 你咳嗽是因为你抽烟导致的。

en: Your father works for a bank, doesn't he?
zh: 你爸爸在银行工作，是吧？

en: Your uncle and I have known each other for many years.
zh: 你叔叔和我认识很多年了。

en: Anyway, you'll never know.
zh: 反正，你永远不会知道。

en: Are you all ready?
zh: 你们都准备好了吗？

en: It's not just you, I am also to blame.
zh: 不只是你，我也有责任。

en: It is not good for you to break your promise.
zh: 你不应该违背你的承诺。

en: I don't know whom you want to see.
zh: 我不知道你想见谁。

en: I know that you did your best.
zh: 我知道你尽力了。

en: If you had helped me, I should have succeeded.
zh: 如果你帮了我，我应该会成功的。

en: He came to see you right after you left.
zh: 你刚走他就来看你了。

en: There isn't much logic in what you're saying.
zh: 你说的没什么道理。

en: I will keep on smoking no matter what you say.
zh: 不管你怎么说，我都会继续抽烟。

en: By the time you come back, I'll be gone.
zh: 等你回来的时候，我已经走了。

en: I can't figure out why you don't like jazz.
zh: 我不明白你为什么不喜欢爵士乐。

en: Wherever you go, I will follow you.
zh: 无论你去哪里，我都会跟着你。

en: I didn't know you were such a good cook.
zh: 我不知道你做饭这么好吃。

en: Whenever you may call, you will find him at his books.
zh: 无论你什么时候打电话，你都会发现他在看书。

en: Where did you go yesterday?
zh: 你昨天去哪儿了？

en: You, come here.
zh: 你，过来。

en: It was she who went to Hokkaido yesterday.
zh: 是她昨天去了北海道。

en: She dropped in at my house yesterday.
zh: 她昨天顺便来我家了。

en: He asked about your health yesterday.
zh: 他昨天问起你的健康状况。

en: It was I that phoned him yesterday.
zh: 昨天是我给他打的电话。

en: I had to attend two meetings yesterday, and there was no time to have lunch between.
zh: 我昨天不得不参加两个会议，而且没有时间在中间吃午饭。

en: Yesterday the teacher told us that he would give us a test today.
zh: 昨天老师告诉我们他今天要给我们考试。

en: I saw Bill in the library yesterday.
zh: 昨天我在图书馆看见了比尔。

en: There was a car accident yesterday.
zh: 昨天发生了一起车祸。

en: Yesterday I met two Americans who are bicycling through Japan.
zh: 昨天我遇到了两个骑自行车穿越日本的美国人。

en: I played tennis with Taro yesterday.
zh: 昨天我和太郎一起打了网球。

en: I absented myself from school yesterday.
zh: 昨天我旷课了。

en: Yesterday I saw a girl whom I had met in the library a month before.
zh: 昨天我看见了一个月前在图书馆认识的女孩。

en: Yesterday I nearly ran into Robert in Ginza.
zh: 昨天在银座我差点撞到罗伯特。

en: I caught three fish yesterday.
zh: 昨天我钓了三条鱼。

en: I saw an old friend of mine yesterday.
zh: 昨天我见了一个老朋友。

en: Yesterday a foreigner spoke to me in English on the train.
zh: 昨天在火车上一个外国人用英语和我说话。

en: Only yesterday did I see him.
zh: 直到昨天我才见到他。

en: It rained yesterday.
zh: 昨天下雨了。

en: Until yesterday, I had known nothing about it.
zh: 直到昨天，我对这件事还一无所知。

en: Japanese beef was on sale yesterday.
zh: 昨天日本牛肉在打折。

en: I slept all day yesterday, because it was Sunday.
zh: 昨天我睡了一整天，因为是星期天。

en: We had an examination in biology yesterday.
zh: 昨天我们考了生物。

en: I missed the last bus yesterday.
zh: 昨天我错过了最后一班公交车。

en: We had some visitors yesterday.
zh: 昨天我们来了一些客人。

en: I slept twelve hours yesterday.
zh: 昨天我睡了十二个小时。

en: The weather was perfect yesterday.
zh: 昨天的天气非常好。

en: Two hundred houses were burnt down in the fire which broke out yesterday.
zh: 昨天发生的火灾烧毁了两百栋房屋。

en: We missed you very much at the party yesterday. We had a very good time indeed.
zh: 昨天在聚会上我们非常想念你。我们玩得很开心。

en: It seems like yesterday, but it's actually nearly ten years since we first met.
zh: 感觉就像昨天一样，但实际上距离我们第一次见面已经快十年了。

en: It was not until yesterday that he was free of debt.
zh: 直到昨天他才还清债务。

en: It was not until yesterday that we knew about it.
zh: 直到昨天我们才知道这件事。

en: It was him that broke the window yesterday.
zh: 是他在昨天打破了窗户。

en: There were two marriages here yesterday.
zh: 昨天这里有两场婚礼。

en: My aunt dropped in on me yesterday.
zh: 昨天我姑妈顺便来看我了。

en: A Mr Williams came to see you yesterday.
zh: 昨天一位威廉姆斯先生来找过你。

en: I happened upon Bernard at a restaurant yesterday.
zh: 昨天我在一家餐馆偶然遇到了伯纳德。

en: I met your parents yesterday.
zh: 昨天我见到了你的父母。

en: I enjoyed watching TV yesterday.
zh: 昨天我喜欢看电视。

en: Where is the ticket window?
zh: 售票窗口在哪里？

en: Turn him down once for all.
zh: 彻底拒绝他。

en: A fox is a wild animal.
zh: 狐狸是野生动物。

en: The fox hid in the hollow tree.
zh: 狐狸藏在空心树里。

en: The tail of a fox is longer than that of a rabbit.
zh: 狐狸的尾巴比兔子的尾巴长。

en: Surely the weather will become fine.
zh: 天气一定会好起来的。

en: There'll be standing room only.
zh: 到时候只有站票了。

en: I think we can be friends.
zh: 我想我们可以成为朋友。

en: I'm sure he has something up his sleeve.
zh: 我肯定他有什么不可告人的秘密。

en: I bet all will turn out well.
zh: 我打赌一切都会好起来的。

en: I'm sure she will turn up soon.
zh: 我肯定她很快就会出现的。

en: No doubt she will come soon.
zh: 毫无疑问，她很快就会来的。

en: I'm sure she'll get over her illness soon.
zh: 我肯定她很快就会康复的。

en: I bet he will get mad.
zh: 我打赌他会生气的。

en: I bet he arrives late - he always does.
zh: 我打赌他会迟到——他总是这样。

en: I am sure of his accepting our invitation.
zh: 我确信他会接受我们的邀请。

en: I'm sure he is guilty of the murder.
zh: 我确信他犯了谋杀罪。

en: He will certainly attend the meeting.
zh: 他肯定会参加会议。

en: I'm sure of his working for our company.
zh: 我确信他会为我们公司工作。

en: I am sure of his trusting you.
zh: 我确信他信任你。

en: I bet he doesn't make it.
zh: 我打赌他不会成功。

en: I am sure I can get in touch with him by telephone.
zh: 我确信我能通过电话联系到他。

en: I am sure he'll tell you as soon as he comes.
zh: 我确信他一回来就会告诉你。

en: You must have been working too hard.
zh: 你一定是工作太努力了。

en: I'm sure your endeavor will bear fruit.
zh: 我确信你的努力会结出果实。

en: Mind you come on time.
zh: 记住要准时来。

en: I bet the teacher's going to get mad!
zh: 我打赌老师要生气了！

en: Go to those who you are sure will help you.
zh: 去找那些你确定会帮助你的人。

en: Go first to those who you are sure will help you.
zh: 首先去找那些你确定会帮助你的人。

en: Don't fail to write to me.
zh: 一定要给我写信。

en: See that the homework is done by the weekend.
zh: 确保周末前完成作业。

en: Be sure to be in time.
zh: 务必准时到达。

en: I figure it's because when I'm driving around, my zip code keeps changing.
zh: 我觉得是因为我开车到处跑的时候，我的邮政编码一直在变。

en: By God, I'll finish this homework.
zh: 天啊，我一定要完成这份作业。

en: The situation, I am sure, will be improved.
zh: 我相信情况会好转的。

en: In all probability, we shall arrive before them.
zh: 很有可能，我们会比他们先到。

en: I bet we'll have a test today.
zh: 我打赌我们今天会有考试。

en: Be sure to pass the exams.
zh: 一定要通过考试。

en: Please write to me without fail.
zh: 请务必给我写信。

en: I'm sure you'll like it.
zh: 我确信你会喜欢的。

en: I'm sure I'll be able to find it.
zh: 我确信我能找到它。

en: I am sure of your son coming back safe and sound.
zh: 我确信你的儿子会平安归来。

en: He must love you.
zh: 他一定很爱你。

en: The weather is sure to be wet.
zh: 天气肯定会是潮湿的。

en: It's going to rain, for sure.
zh: 肯定要下雨了。

en: It's bound to rain.
zh: 肯定要下雨。

en: It must have slipped my mind.
zh: 我一定是忘了。

en: Bob will certainly attend the meeting.
zh: 鲍勃肯定会参加会议。

en: I'll be bound.
zh: 我敢肯定。

en: You must be a good cook.
zh: 你肯定是个好厨师。

en: It should be pleasing.
zh: 这应该会令人愉悦。

en: I'm sure Mom will get mad.
zh: 我肯定妈妈会生气的。

en: I'm sure you were surprised to hear of my marriage.
zh: 我肯定你听到我结婚的消息时很惊讶。

en: I'll miss you so much.
zh: 我会非常想你的。

en: Be sure to come at 3.
zh: 一定要3点来。

en: The policy is bound to drive the economy into further recession.
zh: 这项政策肯定会使经济陷入进一步的衰退。

en: I have a strained back.
zh: 我背拉伤了。

en: His hard life is telling on his health.
zh: 艰苦的生活正在损害他的健康。

en: Hard work injured his health.
zh: 努力工作损害了他的健康。

en: A tight belt will interfere with circulation of the blood.
zh: 腰带太紧会影响血液循环。

en: Don't be so hard on me.
zh: 别对我这么苛刻。

en: Students should attend classes regularly.
zh: 学生应该 регулярно 上课。

en: You should think before you begin to speak.
zh: 你应该三思而后行。

en: Sit up straight.
zh: 坐直了。

en: Shut the door tight.
zh: 把门关紧。

en: No one is so poor that he cannot afford to be neat.
zh: 没有人穷到不能保持整洁。

en: Let's go back the way we came.
zh: 咱们原路返回吧。

en: If you care to, you may come with us.
zh: 如果你愿意，你可以和我们一起去。

en: You may invite whoever wants to come.
zh: 你可以邀请任何想来的人。

en: Can you play the guitar?
zh: 你会弹吉他吗？

en: He feels relaxed when he's playing the guitar.
zh: 他弹吉他的时候感觉很放松。

en: The boy playing the guitar is Ken.
zh: 弹吉他的那个男孩是肯。

en: Who is playing the guitar?
zh: 谁在弹吉他？

en: Playing the guitar is fun.
zh: 弹吉他很有趣。

en: The boy playing the guitar is my brother.
zh: 弹吉他的那个男孩是我的弟弟。

en: Will you tell me how to play the guitar?
zh: 你能告诉我怎么弹吉他吗？

en: Playing country-western music on guitar is real kid stuff to a true professional.
zh: 对一个真正的专业人士来说，用吉他弹奏乡村音乐简直是小菜一碟。

en: I want a guitar.
zh: 我想要一把吉他。

en: The jagged edge ripped a hole in his trousers.
zh: 锯齿状的边缘在他的裤子上撕开了一个洞。

en: The smirking male clerk replied.
zh: 那个带着假笑的男店员回答道。

en: To hear is to obey.
zh: 听命行事。

en: Kie never got off on older men until she met him.
zh: 基以前对年长的男人不感兴趣，直到她遇到了他。

en: Get me the key.
zh: 把钥匙给我。

en: Bring me the key.
zh: 把钥匙拿给我。

en: Keeton put magnets on the heads of his pigeons.
zh: 基顿把磁铁放在他的鸽子头上。

en: Keeton wanted to know if this is true.
zh: 基顿想知道这是不是真的。

en: Keeton supposed that perhaps bird and animals know about these lines.
zh: 基顿认为也许鸟类和动物知道这些线。

en: He got married to Ann last month.
zh: 他上个月和安结婚了。

en: What is a cancer cell like?
zh: 癌细胞是什么样的？

en: Our sales organization for Gamma is not strong.
zh: 我们Gamma的销售组织不够强大。

en: Cambodia appealed to the United Nations for help.
zh: 柬埔寨呼吁联合国提供帮助。

en: The joint-venture in Cambodia backfired.
zh: 在柬埔寨的合资企业适得其反。

en: Cancer can be cured easily if it is found in its first phase.
zh: 如果在第一阶段发现癌症，是可以很容易治愈的。

en: Cancer is a great enemy of humanity.
zh: 癌症是人类的巨大敌人。

en: Cancer is not one but more than a hundred distinct diseases.
zh: 癌症不是一种疾病，而是超过一百种不同的疾病。

en: The drought damaged all the crops there.
zh: 干旱摧毁了那里的所有庄稼。

en: Cancer may be related to viruses of some kind.
zh: 癌症可能与某种病毒有关。

en: Lack of money is a serious hindrance in their fight to conquer cancer.
zh: 缺乏资金是他们战胜癌症的严重障碍。

en: We joined the country club.
zh: 我们加入了乡村俱乐部。

en: We can cure some types of cancer.
zh: 我们可以治愈某些类型的癌症。

en: There is no advantage in losing your temper.
zh: 发脾气没有任何好处。

en: They erected a statue in memory of Gandhi.
zh: 他们竖立了一座雕像来纪念甘地。

en: Cancer took him.
zh: 癌症夺走了他的生命。

en: The outraged employee resigned at once.
zh: 愤怒的员工立即辞职了。

en: He is fuming that they will be sorry for it some day.
zh: 他气得冒烟，总有一天他们会后悔的。

en: A female kangaroo carries its young in the pouch.
zh: 雌性袋鼠把幼崽放在育儿袋里。

en: Let's row the boat in turn.
zh: 我们轮流划船吧。

en: Turn about is fair play.
zh: 风水轮流转。

en: I wish you to go there instead.
zh: 我希望你去那里代替我。

en: The poor girl shed tears.
zh: 可怜的女孩流下了眼泪。

en: Instead use words like "some", "many", "often", and begin statements with openers like, "In my experience, ...", "Excuse me if I'm wrong, but...", "In many instances, ...."
zh: 相反，使用诸如“一些”、“许多”、“经常”之类的词语，并以“根据我的经验……”、“如果我错了，请原谅……”、“在许多情况下……”等开头来陈述。

en: The poor girl lost her way in the dark woods.
zh: 可怜的女孩在黑暗的森林里迷路了。

en: It's all over with poor Tom.
zh: 可怜的汤姆，一切都结束了。

en: The poor old woman was robbed of her money.
zh: 可怜的老妇人被抢走了钱。

en: The poor cat was on the verge of starvation.
zh: 可怜的猫快要饿死了。

en: The poor man was never to see his wife again.
zh: 可怜的人再也见不到他的妻子了。

en: The poor boys were shivering with fear.
zh: 可怜的男孩们冷得瑟瑟发抖。

en: They kept him waiting outside for a long time.
zh: 他们让他在外面等了很久。

en: The poor boy was at a loss what to do.
zh: 那个可怜的男孩不知所措。

en: The poor girl was on the point of death.
zh: 那个可怜的女孩奄奄一息。

en: The poor girl made a living by selling flowers.
zh: 那个可怜的女孩靠卖花为生。

en: The poor little girl did nothing but sob all day.
zh: 那个可怜的小女孩整天只是哭泣。

en: The poor girl went blind.
zh: 那个可怜的女孩失明了。

en: The poor child was on the verge of starvation.
zh: 那个可怜的孩子快要饿死了。

en: The poor child suffers from hay fever.
zh: 那个可怜的孩子患有花粉热。

en: The poor dog was literally torn apart by the lion.
zh: 那只可怜的狗真的被狮子撕成了碎片。

en: The poor girl broke down upon hearing the news.
zh: 那个可怜的女孩听到这个消息后崩溃了。

en: The poor boy was knocked down by a car.
zh: 那个可怜的男孩被汽车撞倒了。

en: The poor little girl did nothing but weep.
zh: 那个可怜的小女孩只是哭泣。

en: The poor old woman had her bag stolen again.
zh: 那个可怜的老妇人又被偷了包。

en: The poor girl went out of her mind.
zh: 那个可怜的女孩精神失常了。

en: And she'll never walk down Lime Street anymore.
zh: 她再也不会走过莱姆街了。

en: To my disappointment, he had already started.
zh: 令我失望的是，他已经开始了。

en: A goose is a water bird.
zh: 鹅是一种水鸟。

en: To my regret, his was nothing but a short-lived triumph.
zh: 令我遗憾的是，他的胜利只是昙花一现。

en: Shopping by mail through catalogs gives people a wide choice of merchandise.
zh: 通过目录邮购给人们提供了广泛的商品选择。

en: Please send me a catalogue.
zh: 请寄给我一本目录。

en: Would you please send me a brochure and price information?
zh: 请您寄给我一份宣传册和价格信息好吗？

en: We look forward to receiving the catalog soon.
zh: 我们期待尽快收到目录。

en: The Carthaginians longed for peace.
zh: 迦太基人渴望和平。

en: I told you never to move in a group.
zh: 我告诉过你不要成群结队地行动。

en: It is hard frozen.
zh: 它冻得很硬。

en: Gasoline became so expensive that we had to let our car go.
zh: 汽油变得太贵了，我们不得不放弃我们的车。

en: Could you fill it up and take a look at the oil, too?
zh: 你能加满油，顺便看看机油吗？

en: Let's find a gas station; we've run out of fuel.
zh: 我们找个加油站吧，我们没油了。

en: The gasoline truck ran into the gate and blew up.
zh: 油罐车撞到了大门，爆炸了。

en: Gasoline is used for fuel.
zh: 汽油被用作燃料。

en: Gasoline is sold by the liter.
zh: 汽油是按升出售的。

en: Should I pay for the gas?
zh: 我应该付汽油费吗？

en: The price of gasoline is so high that we cannot buy a big car.
zh: 汽油价格太高了，我们买不起大车。

en: There is a great demand for gasoline.
zh: 汽油的需求量很大。

en: A gas station is one kilometer ahead.
zh: 前方一公里处有一个加油站。

en: Gasoline stations, roadside stands and small houses followed the new road.
zh: 加油站、路边摊和小房子沿着新路建了起来。

en: The gas is running out.
zh: 汽油快用完了。

en: We're running out of gas.
zh: 我们的汽油快用完了。

en: We have run out of gas.
zh: 我们的汽油用完了。

en: I fell back on the reserve tank when the gas ran out.
zh: 汽油用完后，我启用了备用油箱。

en: Because I had a cold, I stayed at home.
zh: 因为我感冒了，所以我待在家里。

en: You must guard against catching cold.
zh: 你必须预防感冒。

en: Take care not to catch a cold.
zh: 注意不要感冒。

en: If you have a cold, lack of sleep is very bad for you.
zh: 如果你感冒了，睡眠不足对你非常不好。

en: Take this medicine when you have a cold.
zh: 感冒的时候吃这种药。

en: Hot lemon with honey is a good remedy for colds.
zh: 热柠檬加蜂蜜是治疗感冒的好方法。

en: Feed a cold and starve a fever.
zh: 感冒要多吃，发烧要少吃。

en: Take this medicine for your cold three times a day.
zh: 这种药治你的感冒，一天吃三次。

en: I will buy cassette tapes.
zh: 我要去买卡带。

en: Cassette tapes seem to have given way to compact disks in popularity.
zh: 卡带的受欢迎程度似乎已经被CD取代了。

en: What money he earns he spends on books.
zh: 他挣的钱都花在买书上了。

en: It took me a month to get over my cold.
zh: 我花了一个月才治好感冒。

en: I can't get rid of my cold.
zh: 我摆脱不了感冒。

en: It took three weeks for me to get over my cold.
zh: 我花了三个星期才治好感冒。

en: I'm out of gas.
zh: 我没汽油了。

en: I forgot to turn off the gas!
zh: 我忘了关煤气了！

en: Did you turn off the gas?
zh: 你关煤气了吗？

en: Turn off the gas.
zh: 关掉煤气。

en: Please turn off the gas.
zh: 请关掉煤气。

en: It was careless of me to leave the gas on.
zh: 我真粗心，竟然忘了关煤气。

en: Kazu told her that he would go to Brazil in May.
zh: 和夫告诉她他五月份要去巴西。

en: It is said that Kazu is the best soccer player in Japan.
zh: 据说和夫是日本最好的足球运动员。

en: Kazu likes sports very much.
zh: 和夫非常喜欢运动。

en: Please turn up the gas.
zh: 请把煤气开大一点。

en: Do you cook by gas or electricity?
zh: 你用煤气还是电做饭？

en: The gas tank suddenly blew up.
zh: 煤气罐突然爆炸了。

en: A gas stove provides the most even heat for cooking.
zh: 煤气炉为烹饪提供最均匀的热量。

en: Gas seems to be escaping from the pipe.
zh: 好像有煤气从管道里泄漏出来。

en: See if the gas is turned off.
zh: 看看煤气关没关。

en: Great oaks from little acorns grow.
zh: 千里之行，始于足下。(直译：伟大的橡树从小橡子长成。)

en: All right, sir. The salad bar is over there.
zh: 好的，先生。沙拉吧在那边。

en: You had better take an umbrella.
zh: 你最好带把伞。

en: He needn't have brought the umbrella.
zh: 他本不必带伞的。

en: I've lost my umbrella. I must buy a new one.
zh: 我把伞弄丢了，我得买一把新的。

en: The birds in the cage are singing merrily.
zh: 笼子里的鸟儿欢快地唱着歌。

en: Half of the bananas in the basket were rotten.
zh: 篮子里一半的香蕉都烂了。

en: There are some apples in the basket.
zh: 篮子里有一些苹果。

en: There are few apples in the basket.
zh: 篮子里几乎没有苹果。

en: There are some good apples in the basket.
zh: 篮子里有一些好苹果。

en: There is a basket under the table.
zh: 桌子下面有一个篮子。

en: I'll ring you back.
zh: 我会给你回电话的。

en: You would make a good diplomat.
zh: 你会成为一个出色的外交官。

en: Traffic was blocked by a landslide.
zh: 山体滑坡阻断了交通。

en: Gambling brought about his ruin.
zh: 赌博导致了他的毁灭。

en: Cocktail parties can be boring.
zh: 鸡尾酒会可能会很无聊。

en: Thus, internationalization has become a fashionable slogan for the Japanese.
zh: 因此，国际化已经成为日本人时髦的口号。

en: Thus, they cannot be detected by other animals that threaten them.
zh: 因此，它们不会被威胁它们的其他动物发现。

en: Would you help me look for my keys?
zh: 你能帮我找一下我的钥匙吗？

en: The questions involved go far beyond economics.
zh: 所涉及的问题远远超出了经济学的范畴。

en: Frogs are afraid of snakes.
zh: 青蛙害怕蛇。

en: The frog inflated himself more and more, until finally he burst.
zh: 青蛙把自己越吹越大，直到最后爆炸了。

en: I can't distinguish a frog from a toad.
zh: 我分不清青蛙和蟾蜍。

en: Let's return when the frog croaks.
zh: 等青蛙叫了我们就回去吧。

en: A frog came out of the water.
zh: 一只青蛙从水里出来了。

en: Maples turn red in fall.
zh: 秋天枫树会变红。

en: Is there room at the counter?
zh: 柜台有空位吗？

en: Tennis shoes are sold behind the counter.
zh: 网球鞋在柜台后面出售。

en: Let's make believe that we are cowboys.
zh: 咱们来假装我们是牛仔吧。

en: A cowboy is driving cattle to the pasture.
zh: 一个牛仔正在赶牛去牧场。

en: A couch potato is something that I don't want to be.
zh: 我不想成为一个沙发土豆。

en: Gauss had an innate talent for mathematical problems.
zh: 高斯在数学问题上有着与生俱来的天赋。

en: Don't rely too much on your guidebook.
zh: 不要太依赖你的旅游指南。

en: The guide told the kids not to take a picture.
zh: 导游告诉孩子们不要拍照。

en: A guide conducted the visitors round the museum.
zh: 导游带领游客参观了博物馆。

en: The guide will lead us to the famous park.
zh: 导游将带领我们去著名的公园。

en: The guide led us to the hotel.
zh: 导游把我们带到了酒店。

en: To make a long story short, he married his first love.
zh: 长话短说，他娶了他的初恋。

en: To make a long story short, everything went fine.
zh: 长话短说，一切都很顺利。

en: When she dumped me, the shock of it was like a huge gong going off and scrambling all my thoughts.
zh: 当她甩了我的时候，那种震惊就像一声巨大的锣响，打乱了我所有的思绪。

en: He had the stupidity to try to help Carlo.
zh: 他愚蠢地试图帮助卡洛。

en: Carl showed me the gold medal.
zh: 卡尔给我看了金牌。

en: Carl looked very happy.
zh: 卡尔看起来很高兴。

en: Carl, you're obsessed with money.
zh: 卡尔，你太痴迷于钱了。

en: That's Carl.
zh: 那是卡尔。

en: Carl cannot have been a model student.
zh: 卡尔不可能是一个模范学生。

en: It took me by surprise to hear that Carl was moving to Germany.
zh: 听到卡尔要搬到德国，我感到很惊讶。

en: Karl Lange's record breaking long jump took the crowd's breath away.
zh: 卡尔·朗格打破纪录的跳远让观众惊叹不已。

en: To borrow an argument from Karl Popper, a hypothesis is only of value if it can be tested.
zh: 借用卡尔·波普尔的一个论点，一个假设只有在可以被检验时才有价值。

en: The price of the carpet is determined by three factors.
zh: 地毯的价格由三个因素决定。

en: Please be careful not to trip over the carpet.
zh: 请小心，不要被地毯绊倒。

en: The curve extends from point A to point B.
zh: 曲线从A点延伸到B点。

en: Is this your interesting book?
zh: 这是你那本有趣的书吗？

en: Please deal the card.
zh: 请发牌。

en: Please insert your card.
zh: 请插入您的卡。

en: Charge it, please.
zh: 请刷卡。

en: The room looks different after I've changed the curtains.
zh: 换了窗帘后，房间看起来不一样了。

en: Take down those curtains and send them to be cleaned.
zh: 把那些窗帘取下来送去清洗。

en: Open the curtains and let the sunshine in.
zh: 打开窗帘，让阳光进来。

en: When I opened the curtains, it was snowing.
zh: 当我打开窗帘时，正在下雪。

en: May I draw the curtains?
zh: 我可以拉上窗帘吗？

en: We require the garden fences for immediate delivery.
zh: 我们需要立即交付花园栅栏。

en: I have settled on green for the curtains.
zh: 我决定用绿色的窗帘。

en: The curtains were taken down.
zh: 窗帘被取下来了。

en: The curtain has not yet risen.
zh: 幕布尚未拉开。

en: Let's hide behind the curtain.
zh: 我们躲在幕后吧。

en: Who is hiding behind the curtain?
zh: 谁躲在幕后？

en: A silhouette of a girl appeared on the curtain.
zh: 窗帘上出现了一个女孩的轮廓。

en: The curtain caught fire.
zh: 窗帘着火了。

en: The curtains and the carpet are a good match.
zh: 窗帘和地毯很搭配。

en: Curtains and carpets were renewed.
zh: 窗帘和地毯都换新了。

en: I can't see in because the curtains are closed.
zh: 我看不到里面，因为窗帘关着。

en: The curtains blew in the wind.
zh: 窗帘在风中飘动。

en: The curtains were drawn slowly.
zh: 窗帘慢慢地拉开了。

en: The curtains make this room beautiful.
zh: 窗帘使这个房间变得漂亮。

en: It was yesterday morning that I saw Mr Carter.
zh: 我昨天早上看到的卡特先生。

en: I can't apologize enough.
zh: 我怎么道歉都不够。

en: I'd like to say a few words by way of apology.
zh: 我想说几句道歉的话。

en: I wish to say a word of apology.
zh: 我想说一声抱歉。

en: I apologize for it.
zh: 我为此道歉。

en: I must ask your pardon.
zh: 我必须请求您的原谅。

en: Excuse me for interrupting you, but would you mind opening the window?
zh: 打扰一下，请问您介意打开窗户吗？

en: I'm sorry to interrupt you.
zh: 很抱歉打断你。

en: The number is engaged.
zh: 电话占线。

en: May I cut in?
zh: 我可以插句话吗？

en: Have you finished talking?
zh: 你讲完了吗？

en: I see your point.
zh: 我明白你的意思了。

en: Excuse me for interrupting you.
zh: 打扰一下。

en: May I interrupt?
zh: 我可以打断一下吗？

en: The line is busy.
zh: 线路忙。

en: May I talk to you?
zh: 我可以和你谈谈吗？

en: I've enjoyed talking to you.
zh: 我很高兴和你聊天。

en: I have a lot of things to tell you.
zh: 我有很多事情要告诉你。

en: Can we talk?
zh: 我们可以谈谈吗？

en: I wish I had more time to talk with you.
zh: 我希望我有更多的时间和你聊天。

en: May I speak with you?
zh: 我可以和你谈谈吗？

en: Can we have a talk?
zh: 我们可以谈谈吗？

en: These are my thank-you notes.
zh: 这些是我的感谢信。

en: I regret the delay in writing to you to thank you for your hospitality on my visit to your country.
zh: 我很抱歉延迟写信感谢您在我访问贵国期间的热情款待。

en: I can never thank you enough.
zh: 我永远也无法充分感谢您。

en: I have no words to thank you.
zh: 我无法用语言来表达我的感谢。

en: I don't know how to thank you enough.
zh: 我不知道该如何充分感谢您。

en: Don't mention it.
zh: 不用客气。

en: The music next door is very loud. I wish they would turn it down.
zh: 隔壁的音乐太吵了，我希望他们能把声音调小一点。

en: We got this chair for nothing because the lady next door didn't need it anymore.
zh: 我们免费得到了这把椅子，因为隔壁的女士不再需要它了。

en: My neighbors say they're going on a family trip to Hokkaido.
zh: 我的邻居说他们要全家去北海道旅行。

en: I'm glad I could help.
zh: 很高兴我能帮上忙。

en: While they are away, let's take care of their cat.
zh: 他们不在的时候，我们来照顾他们的猫吧。

en: A gentleman called in your absence, sir.
zh: 先生，您不在的时候，有位绅士来拜访过。

en: I will look after your cat while you are away.
zh: 你不在的时候我会照顾你的猫。

en: The shepherd, even when he become a gentleman, smells of the lamb.
zh: 牧羊人即使成了绅士，身上还是有羊膻味。

en: Do you have any bags to check?
zh: 您有行李要托运吗？

en: How many bags do you want to check?
zh: 您想托运几个行李？

en: Bring your friends with you.
zh: 带上你的朋友一起来吧。

en: I've been invited over to a friend's.
zh: 我被邀请去朋友家做客。

en: Do you have an appointment with him?
zh: 你和他有预约吗？

en: I wish I could help you.
zh: 我希望我能帮到你。

en: I'm afraid I can't help you.
zh: 恐怕我帮不了你。

en: Don't put the saddle on the wrong horse.
zh: 不要张冠李戴。

en: I'm looking forward to seeing you.
zh: 我期待见到你。

en: I hope to see you.
zh: 我希望见到你。

en: It's a great honor to be able to meet you.
zh: 很荣幸能见到您。

en: I'm very happy to know you.
zh: 很高兴认识你。

en: I am honored to meet you.
zh: 很荣幸见到您。

en: Good to see you.
zh: 很高兴见到你。

en: I'm pleased to meet you.
zh: 很高兴见到你。

en: I am charmed to see you.
zh: 很高兴见到你。

en: I'm pleased to see you.
zh: 很高兴见到你。

en: We haven't seen you in the past four years.
zh: 我们有四年没见过你了。

en: I have no time to see you.
zh: 我没时间见你。

en: I'm very pleased to meet you.
zh: 很高兴见到你。

en: Could you give me your name?
zh: 你能告诉我你的名字吗？

en: Might I ask your name?
zh: 请问您尊姓大名？

en: May I have your name, please?
zh: 请问您叫什么名字？

en: What was your name?
zh: 你叫什么名字？

en: I am familiar with your name.
zh: 我对你的名字很熟悉。

en: How do you spell your name?
zh: 你的名字怎么拼写？

en: Your name is familiar to me.
zh: 你的名字我很熟悉。

en: May I have your name?
zh: 请问您叫什么名字？

en: May I have your name and room number, please?
zh: 请问您叫什么名字，房间号是多少？

en: Please tell me your name and telephone number.
zh: 请告诉我你的名字和电话号码。

en: May I have your name and telephone number, please?
zh: 请问您叫什么名字和电话号码？

en: Might I ask your name and address?
zh: 请问您尊姓大名和地址？

en: State your name and social security number, please.
zh: 请说出你的姓名和社会安全号码。

en: Your name and flight number, please?
zh: 您的姓名和航班号？

en: Just give me your name and address.
zh: 请告诉我你的姓名和地址。

en: I didn't get your name.
zh: 我没听清你的名字。

en: During Obon there is much confusion at train stations.
zh: 盂兰盆节期间，火车站非常混乱。

en: On the tray are five objects - three of them are keys.
zh: 托盘上有五件物品——其中三件是钥匙。

en: The Bon Festival is near at hand.
zh: 盂兰盆节快到了。

en: I will do whatever you wish.
zh: 我会做任何你希望的事。

en: I will tell you if you wish.
zh: 如果你想听，我会告诉你。

en: I'll help you with pleasure if you want me to.
zh: 如果你需要我帮忙，我很乐意。

en: You may come tomorrow if it is your pleasure to do so.
zh: 如果你愿意，你可以明天来。

en: You may go if you choose.
zh: 如果你选择，你可以走。

en: Thank you for taking the time out to pay a visit to our company.
zh: 感谢您抽出时间来拜访我们公司。

en: All at once, the Buddhist priest burst into laughter, spoiling the solemn atmosphere.
zh: 突然，这位佛教牧师 burst into laughter，破坏了庄严的气氛。

en: Please give my kindest regards to your mother.
zh: 请代我向你母亲问好。

en: Don't worry, Mom. He isn't particular about food. He eats anything.
zh: 妈妈，别担心。他不挑食。他什么都吃。

en: Mother put the food on the table and told the children to dig in.
zh: 妈妈把食物放在桌子上，让孩子们开动。

en: His mother opened her eyes wide.
zh: 他妈妈睁大了眼睛。

en: Unconsciously my mom took hold of the chair.
zh: 不知不觉中，我妈妈抓住了椅子。

en: Mom scolded me for making fun of them.
zh: 妈妈骂我取笑他们。

en: My mother is well off.
zh: 我妈妈很富裕。

en: Their mother let them play in the field.
zh: 他们的母亲让他们在田野里玩耍。

en: Mother bathed the baby.
zh: 妈妈给宝宝洗澡。

en: Mother is busy preparing dinner.
zh: 妈妈正忙着准备晚餐。

en: Mother told me not to keep company with him.
zh: 妈妈告诉我不要和他交往。

en: Mother left me a message.
zh: 妈妈给我留了条信息。

en: Mother insists that I should eat more vegetables.
zh: 妈妈坚持要我多吃蔬菜。

en: Mom is fixing supper now.
zh: 妈妈现在正在做晚饭。

en: Your mother is anxious about your health.
zh: 你妈妈很担心你的健康。

en: Where is mother?
zh: 妈妈在哪里？

en: Mom wants to go there, but Dad wants to watch TV at home.
zh: 妈妈想去那里，但爸爸想在家看电视。

en: My mother looked up the history of coffee cups.
zh: 我妈妈查阅了咖啡杯的历史。

en: Is your mother at home?
zh: 你妈妈在家吗？

en: The mother becomes irritated and frankly, but gently, tells Beth to leave the room.
zh: 母亲变得恼火，坦率但温和地告诉贝丝离开房间。

en: My mother is always complaining about me.
zh: 我妈妈总是抱怨我。

en: My mother is making sandwiches for lunch.
zh: 我妈妈正在做午餐三明治。

en: Try putting yourself in your mother's shoes.
zh: 试着站在你妈妈的立场想想。

en: Your mother will probably object to your climbing the mountain.
zh: 你妈妈可能会反对你爬山。

en: You have to make good the promise for your mother.
zh: 你必须为你母亲履行诺言。

en: The mother's mother is a nurse.
zh: 母亲的母亲是一位护士。

en: Don't be a trouble to mother.
zh: 不要给妈妈添麻烦。

en: Get your mother to do your homework!
zh: 让你妈妈帮你做作业！

en: Do you think your mom could set me up, too?
zh: 你觉得你妈妈也能给我介绍对象吗？

en: Don't answer your mother back.
zh: 不要顶撞你妈妈。

en: Please make my excuses for absence to your mother.
zh: 请替我向你母亲请假。

en: Please remember me to your mother.
zh: 请代我向你母亲问好。

en: He wanted to be on equal footing with his mother.
zh: 他想和他母亲平起平坐。

en: Her mother, Mrs Brown, increased the amount of vegetables in her diet.
zh: 她的母亲，布朗夫人，增加了饮食中蔬菜的摄入量。

en: Mom alone can make this cake.
zh: 只有妈妈才能做这个蛋糕。

en: Because my mother is sick, my father will cook today.
zh: 因为我妈妈生病了，今天我爸爸做饭。

en: With your mother in the hospital, you'll have to work harder.
zh: 你妈妈住院了，你得更努力工作。

en: All of a sudden, my mother began to sing.
zh: 突然，我妈妈开始唱歌。

en: Mom bought a pretty doll for me.
zh: 妈妈给我买了一个漂亮的洋娃娃。

en: I, your mother, will take care of everything for you.
zh: 我，你的母亲，会照顾你的一切。

en: I could see that my mother was in a lot of pain.
zh: 我看得出我妈妈很痛苦。

en: The boy opened the window, although his mother told him not to.
zh: 男孩打开了窗户，尽管他妈妈告诉他不要开。

en: I hope that your mother gets well soon.
zh: 我希望你妈妈早日康复。

en: When your mother scolds you, don't talk back.
zh: 你妈妈责骂你的时候，不要顶嘴。

en: What should we do if Mom didn't give us money?
zh: 如果妈妈不给我们钱，我们该怎么办？

en: You mustn't answer your mother back when she scolds you.
zh: 当你的母亲责骂你时，你一定不要顶嘴。

en: You shouldn't answer your mother back like that when she scolds you.
zh: 妈妈批评你的时候，你不应该那样顶撞她。

en: Mother has sent you some cakes and milk.
zh: 妈妈给你送了一些蛋糕和牛奶。

en: When will we eat dinner, Mom?
zh: 妈妈，我们什么时候吃晚饭？

en: Mom! Hurry!
zh: 妈！快点！

en: Mother, having thought about it carefully, I don't feel I should marry him.
zh: 妈妈，我仔细考虑过了，我觉得我不应该嫁给他。

en: I smell something burning, Mother.
zh: 妈妈，我闻到有东西烧焦了。

en: Can I go swimming, Mother?
zh: 妈妈，我可以去游泳吗？

en: Mom, add a little more salt to the soup.
zh: 妈，在汤里多加一点盐。

en: Dad told me to help you, Mom.
zh: 爸爸让我来帮你，妈。

en: I hope your mother will regain her health soon.
zh: 我希望你母亲早日康复。

en: You have eaten lunch, haven't you?
zh: 你吃过午饭了吧？

en: I am looking forward to hearing from you.
zh: 我期待收到你的来信。

en: I look forward to hearing from you.
zh: 我期待收到你的来信。

en: The party of pilgrims started for Shikoku.
zh: 朝圣者队伍出发前往四国。

en: I have been waiting for your reply, but have not heard from you.
zh: 我一直在等你回复，但是没有收到你的消息。

en: I'm looking forward to your reply.
zh: 我期待你的回复。

en: I'm extremely embarrassed that it has taken so long to reply.
zh: 我为这么久才回复感到非常抱歉。

en: Your response is greatly appreciated and will enable us to prepare more efficiently.
zh: 非常感谢您的回复，这将使我们能够更有效地做好准备。

en: Please respond.
zh: 请回复。

en: I have not heard from you. I was wondering if maybe my mail never got to you.
zh: 我没有收到你的消息。我想知道是不是我的邮件没有寄到你那里。

en: I'm sorry for the delay in my reply.
zh: 很抱歉回复晚了。

en: Excuse me for not having answered your letter sooner.
zh: 很抱歉这么晚才回信。

en: I'm looking forward to receiving your reply.
zh: 我期待收到你的回复。

en: Thanks for your reply.
zh: 谢谢你的回复。

en: I'll pay you back with my calculus notes.
zh: 我会用我的微积分笔记来偿还你。

en: I gave her a doll in return.
zh: 我给了她一个娃娃作为回报。

en: I will show you around in return.
zh: 我会带你四处看看作为回报。

en: How are you doing these days?
zh: 你最近怎么样？

en: I just dropped in to say goodbye.
zh: 我只是顺便来道个别。

en: I've come to say goodbye.
zh: 我是来道别的。

en: Two years have passed since we parted.
zh: 我们分别已经两年了。

en: The quality of rice is going down.
zh: 大米的质量正在下降。

en: The starving man devoured the food.
zh: 那个饥饿的人狼吞虎咽地吃着食物。

en: Hold in your stomach.
zh: 收腹。

en: Please come hungry.
zh: 请饿着肚子来。

en: When she saw that the people were hungry, she begged for food for them.
zh: 当她看到人们饿了，她就为他们乞讨食物。

en: I have gas.
zh: 我胀气了。

en: I'm getting hungry.
zh: 我开始饿了。

en: Not only were we hungry, but we were also suffering from thirst.
zh: 我们不仅饿，而且还口渴。

en: I doubled over with laughter.
zh: 我笑得前仰后合。

en: My stomach aches after meals.
zh: 我饭后胃疼。

en: I'm starved.
zh: 我饿死了。

en: I have hunger pangs.
zh: 我饿得咕咕叫。

en: It goes without saying that hunger is the best sauce.
zh: 饥饿是最好的调味品，这是不言而喻的。

en: Aren't you hungry?
zh: 你不饿吗？

en: My stomach is growling.
zh: 我的肚子在咕咕叫。

en: My stomach is full.
zh: 我吃饱了。

en: Is the bath ready?
zh: 洗澡水准备好了吗？

en: The bath is ready.
zh: 洗澡水准备好了。

en: There was no bathroom.
zh: 没有浴室。

en: Your bath is ready.
zh: 您的洗澡水准备好了。

en: It's time to take a bath.
zh: 该洗澡了。

en: When I was taking a bath, the telephone rang.
zh: 我洗澡的时候，电话响了。

en: Taking a bath makes me relax.
zh: 洗澡让我放松。

en: There is nothing as relaxing as lying in a hot bath.
zh: 没有什么比泡在热水澡里更放松的了。

en: I met your father once.
zh: 我见过你父亲一次。

en: I'm sorry to hear that your father has passed away.
zh: 听到你父亲去世的消息，我很难过。

en: Stop bothering your father.
zh: 别打扰你父亲。

en: Dad is a hard worker.
zh: 爸爸工作很努力。

en: Dad rarely gets back home before midnight.
zh: 爸爸很少在午夜前回家。

en: My dad has a look at the newspaper every morning.
zh: 我爸爸每天早上都会看报纸。

en: My father turned a dead ear to my requests.
zh: 我父亲对我的要求置若罔闻。

en: Dad bought me a camera.
zh: 爸爸给我买了一台照相机。

en: Father is having a bath.
zh: 爸爸正在洗澡。

en: Father is in the habit of reading the paper before breakfast.
zh: 爸爸习惯在早餐前看报纸。

en: My father gave me a puppy for my birthday.
zh: 我爸爸在我生日的时候送给我一只小狗。

en: Is Father in the kitchen?
zh: 爸爸在厨房吗？

en: Does your father get home early?
zh: 你爸爸回家早吗？

en: Father got to his office on time.
zh: 爸爸准时到达办公室。

en: Father found me a good seat.
zh: 爸爸帮我找到了一个好座位。

en: When my dad found out that I've been going out with Nimrod Nick, he blew his top.
zh: 当我爸爸发现我和尼姆罗德·尼克约会时，他勃然大怒。

en: My father has been washing his car since this morning.
zh: 我父亲从今天早上就开始洗车了。

en: Dad needs to take a rest. He's been working in the garden for three hours.
zh: 爸爸需要休息一下。他已经在花园里工作了三个小时了。

en: Father lay watching TV.
zh: 爸爸躺着看电视。

en: Dad can blow many smoke rings.
zh: 爸爸可以吹出很多烟圈。

en: My father runs a restaurant.
zh: 我爸爸经营一家餐馆。

en: Bear in mind that Father is not as strong as he used to be.
zh: 记住，爸爸不像以前那么强壮了。

en: Is your father about yet?
zh: 你爸爸在家吗？

en: Father ran to the bus stop.
zh: 爸爸跑到公共汽车站。

en: Where is Father?
zh: 爸爸在哪里？

en: My father was lying down while watching TV.
zh: 我爸爸躺着看电视。

en: A stranger asked the girl whether her father was at home or at his office.
zh: 一个陌生人问那个女孩她爸爸是在家还是在办公室。

en: Father advanced me a week's allowance.
zh: 爸爸预支了我一周的零用钱。

en: Dad bought a camera.
zh: 爸爸买了一台照相机。

en: How old might your father be?
zh: 你爸爸大概多大年纪了？

en: When did your father come home?
zh: 你爸爸什么时候回家的？

en: When will Father be back?
zh: 爸爸什么时候回来？

en: Your father deprived you of your guitar.
zh: 你爸爸剥夺了你弹吉他的权利。

en: Does Father know you've broken his watch?
zh: 爸爸知道你弄坏了他的手表吗？

en: What does your father do?
zh: 你爸爸是做什么的？

en: Go and sit by your father.
zh: 去你爸爸身边坐着。

en: Ask your dad to help you.
zh: 让你爸爸帮你。

en: Don't go against your father.
zh: 不要违背你爸爸。

en: Remember me to your father.
zh: 代我向你爸爸问好。

en: Please be sure to give my best regards to your father.
zh: 请务必代我向你爸爸致以最诚挚的问候。

en: Say hello to your father for me.
zh: 替我向你爸爸问好。

en: Best regards to your father.
zh: 代我向你爸爸问好。

en: Send a wire to your father right now.
zh: 立刻给你爸爸发个电报。

en: Take your father a cup of coffee.
zh: 给你爸爸端一杯咖啡。

en: Who drives better, your father or your mother?
zh: 谁开车更好，你爸爸还是你妈妈？

en: My wishes for your father's rapid recovery.
zh: 祝你父亲早日康复。

en: Your father wants you.
zh: 你父亲想见你。

en: Don't make a noise while your father is asleep.
zh: 你父亲睡觉的时候不要发出声音。

en: My father helped me with my homework.
zh: 我爸爸帮我做了作业。

en: I was told to inform you that your father was killed in an accident.
zh: 我被告知通知你，你父亲在事故中去世了。

en: Father took us to the zoo yesterday.
zh: 昨天爸爸带我们去了动物园。

en: Finish your homework by the time your father comes home.
zh: 在你父亲回家之前完成你的作业。

en: When Dad came home, I was watching TV.
zh: 爸爸回家的时候，我在看电视。

en: He will take over the business when his father retires.
zh: 他父亲退休后，他将接管公司。

en: I have a message for you from your father.
zh: 我有一个你父亲给你的留言。

en: Dad often works late, and Mom complains a lot.
zh: 爸爸经常工作到很晚，妈妈抱怨很多。

en: Dad is shaving in the bathroom.
zh: 爸爸正在浴室刮胡子。

en: Because his father was working there.
zh: 因为他父亲在那里工作。

en: Would that our father were here to help us.
zh: 要是我们父亲在这里帮助我们就好了。

en: May I use your car, Dad?
zh: 爸爸，我可以用你的车吗？

en: What are you doing, Dad?
zh: 爸爸，你在做什么？

en: Shall I fetch your glasses from the living room, Dad?
zh: 爸爸，要我去客厅帮你拿眼镜吗？

en: When will Mother be back, Father?
zh: 爸爸，妈妈什么时候回来？

en: I'm sorry to hear that your father passed away.
zh: 听到你父亲去世的消息，我很难过。

en: The farmers must be happy to hear that.
zh: 农民们听到这个消息一定很高兴。

en: You look very tired. You must have been working too hard.
zh: 你看上去很累。你一定是工作太努力了。

en: You must be tired, but hang on 'til 3.
zh: 你一定很累了，但坚持到三点。

en: What do you say to staying?
zh: 你觉得留下来怎么样？

en: I found a real bargain.
zh: 我发现了一个真正的便宜货。

en: Be so kind as to help the old.
zh: 请您帮帮这位老人。

en: Old people get up very early.
zh: 老年人起得很早。

en: Keep these seats for the elderly.
zh: 把这些座位留给老人。

en: Be kind to the old.
zh: 善待老人。

en: To offer your seat to the old that is a kindness indeed.
zh: 给老人让座真是一种善举。

en: It is good to be kind to old people.
zh: 善待老人是好事。

en: Be kind to old people.
zh: 善待老人。

en: We should be kind to the aged.
zh: 我们应该善待老年人。

en: You must be kind to old people.
zh: 你必须善待老人。

en: Might I ask your age?
zh: 请问您多大年纪？

en: Come right in.
zh: 请进。

en: I can't eat meat.
zh: 我不能吃肉。

en: The sun is shining brightly.
zh: 阳光明媚。

en: Would you like meat or fish?
zh: 您要肉还是鱼？

en: You two look exactly like brother and sister.
zh: 你们俩长得简直像亲兄妹。

en: How are you related?
zh: 你们是什么关系？

en: I wish you both happiness and prosperity.
zh: 祝你们幸福发财。

en: I'm not in a position to answer.
zh: 我不方便回答。

en: Boil some water.
zh: 烧点水。

en: Don't use all the hot water.
zh: 别把热水都用光了。

en: Is the water hot enough to make the tea?
zh: 水够热可以泡茶了吗？

en: They not only washed off the sweat, dirt and cares of the day in the hot water, but also enjoyed gossiping about everyday affairs.
zh: 他们不仅用热水洗去了汗水、污垢和一天的烦恼，还喜欢闲聊家常。

en: The water has boiled away.
zh: 水烧干了。

en: The water hardly began to boil when she added the ingredients.
zh: 水刚开始沸腾，她就把配料加进去了。

en: The hot water isn't running.
zh: 没有热水了。

en: The water is boiling away.
zh: 水快烧干了。

en: I will pick up a little something for you.
zh: 我会给你带点小东西。

en: It is so nice of you to give me a present.
zh: 你送我礼物真是太好了。

en: Do you have enough time to buy enough things for souvenirs?
zh: 你有没有足够的时间买足够的纪念品？

en: Please tell her to call me back.
zh: 请告诉她给我回个电话。

en: Thank you for calling.
zh: 谢谢你的来电。

en: What's the name of that store again, please?
zh: 请问那个店叫什么名字来着？

en: I entered the shop, and a clerk said, "May I help you?"
zh: 我走进商店，一个店员说：“有什么可以帮您吗？”

en: How is the weather?
zh: 天气怎么样？

en: The weather is as nice as nice can be.
zh: 天气好极了。

en: It is a fine day and I feel like going fishing.
zh: 今天天气很好，我想去钓鱼。

en: It being a fine day, I took a walk in the suburbs.
zh: 天气晴朗，我在郊区散步。

en: The weather is crook.
zh: 天气很糟糕。

en: It moves the bowels.
zh: 它能促进肠胃蠕动。

en: It may rain around noon.
zh: 中午前后可能会下雨。

en: He came a little after noon.
zh: 他中午过后不久来的。

en: Do you remember buying me lunch?
zh: 你还记得给我买午饭吗？

en: You are supposed to be back by noon.
zh: 你应该在中午之前回来。

en: Let's have one of those boxed lunches they sell at train stations.
zh: 我们来一份火车站卖的那种盒饭吧。

en: Scott! Please make hotdogs for lunch.
zh: 斯科特！请做热狗当午饭。

en: Are sandwiches OK for lunch?
zh: 午饭吃三明治可以吗？

en: Leave it to me to prepare lunch.
zh: 午饭就交给我准备吧。

en: See you at lunch.
zh: 午饭见。

en: Let's have lunch.
zh: 我们去吃午饭吧。

en: I will call for you at noon.
zh: 我中午会打电话给你。

en: Lunch is on.
zh: 这顿午饭我请客。

en: Let's take a short drive this afternoon.
zh: 今天下午我们出去兜风一下吧。

en: What are we going to do for lunch?
zh: 我们午饭吃什么？

en: I've been looking forward to your arrival.
zh: 我一直盼着你的到来。

en: I'll make tea for you.
zh: 我给你泡茶。

en: Would you mind making tea for me?
zh: 你介意帮我泡茶吗？

en: I'd like some tea, please.
zh: 请给我来点茶。

en: Have some tea, won't you?
zh: 喝点茶吧，好吗？

en: It's about time you got the tea ready.
zh: 你早该把茶准备好了。

en: Refresh yourself with a cup of tea.
zh: 喝杯茶提提神吧。

en: After we had tea, we began the discussion.
zh: 喝完茶后，我们开始了讨论。

en: While we were having tea, there was an earthquake.
zh: 我们喝茶的时候，发生了地震。

en: After you've had some tea, carry on practising.
zh: 你喝完茶后，继续练习。

en: Come and have tea with me.
zh: 来和我一起喝茶吧。

en: Let's talk over a cup of tea, shall we?
zh: 我们喝杯茶聊聊吧，好吗？

en: How about making me a cup of tea?
zh: 要不你给我泡杯茶怎么样？

en: Please bring a cup of tea to me.
zh: 请给我端一杯茶来。

en: He refreshed himself with a cup of tea.
zh: 他喝了杯茶提提神。

en: Will you have a cup of tea?
zh: 你要喝杯茶吗？

en: Please give me a cup of tea.
zh: 请给我一杯茶。

en: I'd like a cup of tea.
zh: 我想要一杯茶。

en: Would you like to have a cup of tea?
zh: 你想喝一杯茶吗？

en: Will you have some more tea?
zh: 你要再来点茶吗？

en: Won't you have some more tea?
zh: 要不要再来点茶？

en: Give me some more tea.
zh: 再给我来点茶。

en: Would you like some more tea?
zh: 你想再来点茶吗？

en: Would you like another cup of tea?
zh: 您要再来一杯茶吗？

en: Would you care for another cup of tea?
zh: 您要不要再来一杯茶？

en: Would you like a cup of tea?
zh: 您要来一杯茶吗？

en: Won't you have some tea?
zh: 您要不要喝点茶？

en: Tea was introduced from China.
zh: 茶叶是从中国引进的。

en: Would you like tea or coffee?
zh: 您要茶还是咖啡？

en: Fifty persons can be accommodated for tea.
zh: 可以容纳五十人喝茶。

en: If you put more tea leaves into the pot, the tea will taste better.
zh: 如果你在壶里多放些茶叶，茶的味道会更好。

en: The tea tree is a kind of camellia.
zh: 茶树是一种山茶花。

en: Please clear away the tea things.
zh: 请把茶具收拾一下。

en: The quality of tea is going down.
zh: 茶叶的质量正在下降。

en: Which do you prefer, tea or coffee?
zh: 你更喜欢茶还是咖啡？

en: Which would you rather have, tea or coffee?
zh: 你更想喝茶还是咖啡？

en: Which do you like better, tea or coffee?
zh: 你更喜欢茶还是咖啡？

en: Tea and coffee helps to start the day.
zh: 茶和咖啡有助于开始新的一天。

en: The tea is too strong. Add some water.
zh: 茶太浓了。加点水。

en: We've run out of tea.
zh: 我们的茶叶用完了。

en: I'd like a tea.
zh: 我想要一杯茶。

en: I'm ashamed to say that it's true.
zh: 我很惭愧地说，这是真的。

en: I'm glad to meet you.
zh: 很高兴见到你。

en: Do you know each other?
zh: 你们认识吗？

en: Please let us know.
zh: 请告诉我们。

en: I hope your birthday is full of song and good times all day long! Happy birthday!
zh: 我希望你的生日充满歌声和美好时光！生日快乐！

en: Happy birthday to you!
zh: 祝你生日快乐！

en: May I escort you home?
zh: 我可以送你回家吗？

en: Just observe your cat and you will get to know him.
zh: 你只要观察你的猫，就会了解它。

en: How late are you open?
zh: 你们开到几点？

en: Your garden needs some attention.
zh: 你的花园需要打理一下了。

en: How do you heat the house?
zh: 你们怎么给房子供暖？

en: I suggest that your son come to our party.
zh: 我建议你儿子来参加我们的聚会。

en: Your dog is very big.
zh: 你的狗真大。

en: How is it going with your family?
zh: 你家里一切都好吗？

en: What kinds of goods do you sell in your shop?
zh: 你的店里卖些什么商品？

en: Your children look healthy.
zh: 你的孩子们看起来很健康。

en: Let me take you home.
zh: 我送你回家吧。

en: I am surprised that your family has a Japanese car.
zh: 我很惊讶你们家有日本车。

en: Do you let your children drink coffee?
zh: 你让你的孩子们喝咖啡吗？

en: A burglar broke into your house while you were away on vacation.
zh: 你度假的时候，有个窃贼闯入了你的房子。

en: Please feel free to have a second helping.
zh: 请随便再来一份。

en: Don't talk about it in my mother's presence.
zh: 别在我妈妈面前说这件事。

en: Would you like to wait?
zh: 您要等一下吗？

en: Please hang on. I'll put him on the phone.
zh: 请稍等，我让他接电话。

en: You'll have to wait.
zh: 你得等一下。

en: Thank you for your patience.
zh: 感谢您的耐心。

en: I'm sorry to have kept you waiting.
zh: 很抱歉让您久等了。

en: Take care of yourself.
zh: 照顾好自己。

en: Did you get the package I sent you?
zh: 你收到我寄给你的包裹了吗？

en: At the funeral, the widow looked very dignified, with her black suit, hat and gloves.
zh: 在葬礼上，寡妇穿着黑色的套装、帽子和手套，看起来非常庄重。

en: Will I do as your partner?
zh: 我可以做你的搭档吗？

en: We look forward to your early reply.
zh: 我们期待您的早日回复。

en: You may use my bicycle such as it is.
zh: 这辆自行车你随便用吧，就这样了。

en: My car, such as it is, is at your disposal.
zh: 我的车，虽然不怎么样，你随便用。

en: You shall be my daughter's husband.
zh: 你将会成为我女儿的丈夫。

en: I don't mean to make you worry.
zh: 我不想让你担心。

en: I will sue you.
zh: 我要起诉你。

en: Guys, what are you talking about? Are you gonna steal my date!?
zh: 你们在说什么呢？你们要抢我的约会对象吗？

en: I think you'll like it too.
zh: 我想你也会喜欢的。

en: You're really a number-one fool.
zh: 你真是个头号傻瓜。

en: You had better take this medicine if you want to get well.
zh: 你最好把这药吃了，如果你想好起来的话。

en: You are lying to me.
zh: 你在骗我。

en: You wouldn't be so casual about it if you were directly involved.
zh: 如果你直接参与其中，你就不会这么随便了。

en: It will take a long time to live down your disgrace.
zh: 你要花很长时间才能洗刷你的耻辱。

en: You trust people too much.
zh: 你太相信别人了。

en: You have only to sweep the floor.
zh: 你只需要扫地就行了。

en: He told me point-blank that I was fired.
zh: 他直截了当地告诉我，我被解雇了。

en: Have you made up your mind to become a teacher?
zh: 你已经决定要当老师了吗？

en: You have a habit of exaggerating everything.
zh: 你有个夸大其词的习惯。

en: I brought you up under my personal care.
zh: 我把你一手带大。

en: You are old enough to take care of yourself.
zh: 你已经长大到可以照顾自己了。

en: You've taken everything.
zh: 你把一切都拿走了。

en: You always try to blame somebody else.
zh: 你总是试图责怪别人。

en: You are a goody-goody.
zh: 你是个老好人。

en: You did it all right.
zh: 你做得完全正确。

en: Don't scatter your things about.
zh: 不要乱扔东西。

en: I sure rubbed your nose in shit.
zh: 我肯定让你丢尽了脸。
